title: How to Win a Rival's Pink Slip in Need for Speed Most Wanted

steps.title: Turn off the auto save feature for sometime.
steps.content: Turn off the auto save feature for sometime. The Marker lies among the first three markers. The slip shifts to the next marker each time you uncover it. So if you get it at position 2, then for the next rival it would be at position 3, and if it is on position 3 then it would be at position 1 the next time. so it is crucial to find it once at the first rival.

steps.title: Choose a random marker, if it contains the pink slip then you are lucky, You need to remember the position i.e.
steps.content: Choose a random marker, if it contains the pink slip then you are lucky, You need to remember the position i.e. 1,2 or 3 of the pink slip. Otherwise, choose another marker, that may contain the pink slip. If that also doesn't have the pink slip then obviously the remaining one of the three has got the pink slip.

steps.title: Exit the game at this moment and again win the race
steps.content: Exit the game at this moment and again win the race

steps.title: Repeat from step 2 until you get the pink slip.
steps.content: Repeat from step 2 until you get the pink slip.

steps.title: Turn on the Auto Save feature once you get the first pink slip.
steps.content: Turn on the Auto Save feature once you get the first pink slip.

steps.title: Remember, the next it will always come in sequence.
steps.content: Remember, the next it will always come in sequence.
